oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A new maiden secretly eats the marrow from inside the ostrich's thigh-bone, although she is not supposed to. 1) p.5405v: this story was told to Dia!kwain by his mother (=kamme-an); the |xam names for the marrow that used to be inside the ostrich's thigh-bone, 2) This story is found in Book V-18.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The new maiden who ate the ostrich marrow from the thigh-bone of the ostrich without the knowledge of her people
